content: I just opened https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/10248 based on some feedback I got at an event last weekend; I'd be curious for a few opinions on the best path forward here.

Is the context here people doing some kind of weekend sprint and wanting to deactivate their account? I'm kinda curious if folks consulted our help docs for this. User deactivation can be kind of a strange thing to document, since it tends to happen for extremely opposite reasons (considerate/responsible users deactivating themselves vs. admins banning others).
No, in this case it was someone who accidentally created 2 accounts, and couldn't figure out how to delete the extra one.
So the sprint aspect was mostly only relevant for them being a totally new user trying to find things :slight_smile:
(But the organization was using custom profile fields)
